

Python Library's:
    os
    Crypto
    base64
    time
    inspect
    ConfigParser
    time
    sys
    nltk
    PyAudio
    termcolor

Install:
    sudo apt-get update
    sudo apt-get upgrade
    sudo apt-get install python-rpi.gpio
    sudo apt-get install python-pip
    sudo pip install termcolor
    sudo pip install colorama
